problem.p: Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A.
Assuming the process 1 to 2 (1 is the initial state and 2 is the final state) to be non-quasi-static, which of the following could be the correct process diagram for the system?

div.p: The process is from 1 to 2, arrow must show this direction. For a non-quasi-static process, intermediate states are not in equilibrium, so we show them by a dashed line.
